Desc.eng: I have a vampire invasion to handle, I'll just leave him here.
Poor soul was torn apart by vampires. Not much time left for him.
The pain is almost gone, but my veins are on fire. Oh, something just moved inside me!
The transformation is already underway. He will rise as a bloodsucker in a few hours.
Are you talking about me? Am I seeing a ghost? So thirsty!
Thirst will be the least of your problems. Oh wait...
I have seen this hundreds of times, but it still makes me tremble with rage.
As soon as I put the stake through his heart, vampires will come running. Get ready!
Take him to the Lair, Katarina, maybe Count Vlados can do something.
